dc_title_s: Plat book of Berrien County, Michigan
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 atlas (unpaged) | Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners. | Notes: Publication date estimated from absence of Michigan and federal highway numbers on folded county map and township maps.|Scale determined from section lines.|Includes folded map affixed to page 1: Berrien Co. Mich. | Scale approximately 1:50,000
